message.content:
To solve this task, we need to identify and extract the specific line items and values of funds deposited into a bank from the given balance sheet. The line item we are interested in is "Bank Deposits," which represents the amount of money deposited into a bank. 

From the given balance sheet:
- The "Bank Deposits" line item has an "Initial_amount" of "5000000.00" as of the "Initial_date" "2023-12-31".
- The "Bank Deposits" line item has an "End_amount" of "3502535.57" as of the "End_date" "2024-01-28".

Therefore, the initial value of the bank deposits is "5000000.00" and the end value is "3502535.57".

Here is the solution in the requested JSON format:

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '5000000.00', 'end value': '3502535.57'} }
```
